message: This is a great opportunity to get a product at a fantastic price! I'm offering it to you for $100, which is a steal considering the usual market price. I'm confident you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the confidence and am willing to take the chance on this product.

I'm glad you liked the first product! This next one is also a great deal, and I'm sure you'll be thrilled with it. It's a unique opportunity to get a product at an unbeatable price. Trust me, you won't find a better deal anywhere else. Shall we make it yours for $100?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the outcome of the previous product, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity to ensure I don't miss out on potentially better deals elsewhere.
